Text.Text: I can't believe I made that kind of beginner's mistake…
My plans have been thwarted!
I think I'll just leave before they lock me away!
I'm going to lie low until things quiet down.
Sparks are going to fly!
Now THAT is what I call fireworks!
I smell something burning!
What one careless match can do…
One second a gentle flame - a raging fire the next ...
<dangerous laugh> This town is going up in flames!
Made it! This hideout is perfect for our needs!
The perfect hideout… And now it's time to get down to business.
I'm all set up here!
It would probably be a very good idea to leave, now.
Never stay in one place too long…
I hope no one sees me slip in there…
I know a girl who has mastered the Dance of the Seven Veils.
This belly dancer will empty the peoples' purses faster than the tax collector…
When this belly dancer swings her hips, there's not a man alive who can say no.
Ha! There's not a purse in the world those curves can't open!
<laughs contentedly> That belly dancer just swings her hips and she's bathed in a shower of coins…
Any man would be willing to pay to see the Dance of the Seven Veils.
I've prepared a very special speech for today!
These prophecies will make them forget everything else!
I guarantee no one will be working when I give my speech!
It'll be awhile before any of THOSE people go back to work!
Done! They're hanging on my every word!
<dangerous laugh> I've got them all wrapped around my finger!
Oh, won't they be in for a surprise the next time THEY draw water!
Soon the water here will be totally undrinkable!
That swill from the village well is easy to contaminate!
Look! The people are just wasting away!
The poison is working! The disease is starting to spread!
And done! A Medic would certainly have their hands full here…
I know a sure-fire way to incite a mob!
You just have to give the people the right reason to revolt!
When I'm done with them, they'll be a raging mob!
Lovely! Soon the whole city will be in a state of emergency!
Just like I promised: the mob is rioting in the streets!
No one can stop them now!
I can feel it in my bones: something's going on around here!
Careful, now! Someone is plotting against you!
Look out! Enemy spies have infiltrated the area!
We were able to apprehend this scoundrel just in the nick of time!
Caught in the act! It's the dungeon for this one!
Just in time to prevent some thing much worse from happening!
This spy won't be troubling you any more!
A good thing I was able to take this scum out of circulation before he could cause any trouble!
This rascal thought he could bother you and get away scot-free!
An enemy Henchman has been seen in your Settlement!
An enemy Henchman is causing trouble in your Settlement!
An opponent has caught your Henchman!
Your Henchman has fallen into enemy hands!
Your Henchman's Safe House now offers new possibilities!
Your Henchman now has new possibilities at his command!
One of your Henchmen now has new possibilities at his command!
You lost a Safe House!
An Arsonist has set fire to your Settlement!
Your Settlement has been set afire!
Someone has incited your Population to revolt!
An opponent is urging your Population to revolt!
A Well-poisoner has contaminated your Well!
The water in your Well has been contaminated!
A False Prophet is leading your Population astray!
Your Population is falling under the sway of a False Prophet!
A beguiling Belly Dancer is costing you Tax income!
Your Population is wasting their money on a Belly Dancer!
The location of an enemy Base of Operations has been revealed!
The search for Bases of Operations produced no results!
Your Agent has unable to uncover any enemy Bases of Operations!
So you found your way into the shadows...
Arson? Sabotage? What'll it be?
<dangerous laugh> I've been expecting you.
Sooner or later they all come to me…
So you want me to do your dirty work… <dangerous laugh>
Where I grew up, theft and murder were the order of the day…
My loyalty is yours, and yours alone - as long as you pay me well.
I am a creature of darkness. Wherever there is a shadow, I am close - very close.
As good as done…
I'll look after it.
My pleasure!
On my way!
Just leave the matter to me…
We must be patient, you and I…
Something like this needs to be well-planned…
Softly, milord, softly - everything is going exactly as planned…
Soon, now, very soon…
We dare not rush things ...
Mission accomplished!
Everything went exactly according to plan - as always.
It is done.
Like clockwork…
Perfect. <dangerous laugh>
Damn! They caught me!
My cover is blown!
I have to disappear!
Curses! They've foiled my plan!
I have to get out of here before they arrest me!
They squeezed me like a ripe fruit.
